text:
This week, Gov. Roy Cooper & @ncdhhs Secretary Dr. Mandy Cohen visited a large-scale #vaccine site at the #UNC Friday Center to witness health care workers & North Carolinians 65+ get the #COVID19 vaccine. Thank you for your support!

Visit https://t.co/1sH7qPvENH for more info. https://t.co/zrYh9Yo4Bi
